summary_detail.value: Liberty Fire Food Unit Leader trainee Dustin Brooks explains one of the aspects of his job, ensuring that the lunches provided to the firefighters each day meet or exceed the nutritional and calorie specifications/guidelines.Link for LF Food Unit Leader Video

title: LF Food Unit Leader explains just what goes into fireline lunches & why (Liberty Fire Wildfire)
